Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1HN1 (XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: skin secretions, Hainan odorous frog,Odorrana hainanensis(China, Asia)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. faecium (MIC 19 uM), S. aureus ATCC2592 (MIC 1.2 uM), S. carnosus KHS (MIC 4.8 uM), B. licheniformis X39 (MIC 2.4 um), R. rhodochrous X15 (MIC 1.2 uM); Gram-negative P. faecalis X29 (MIC 4.8 uM), and fungi S. mould 090223 and C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 1.2-2.4 uM). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Wang H, Yu Z, Hu Y, Li F, Liu L, Zheng H, Meng H, Yang S, Yang X, Liu J.2012
Literature Information.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides isolated from the skin secretions of Hainan odorous frog, Odorrana hainanensis.
